# NorwaySDMs

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

The goal of intSDMs is to create reproducible species distribution models across Norway using INLA.

## Installation

You can install the development version of this package from [GitHub](https://github.com/) with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("PhilipMostert/NorwaySDMs")
```
